Generation IX.Scarlet: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.
Generation IX.Violet: The pair sticks together no matter what. They split any food they find exactly in half and then eat it together.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Pokémon League East Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three West Province: Area Two , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Pokémon League East Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three West Province: Area Two , Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Kitakami Road , Apple Hills , Reveler's Road , Oni Mountain , Oni's Maw , Wistful Fields , Paradise Barrens , Kitakami Wilds
